item.title: A Risk Analysis Bowtie Diagram in Latex
item.description:
Bowtie Diagram in LaTeX

For folks who have to conduct risk analysis, there are very limited choices for the creation of “bowtie diagrams”. Searching the web for examples in LaTeX comes up pretty empty. So when googling comes up empty, its time to create:

Bowtie diagram in LaTeX example

This code results in a diagram that looks pretty acceptable in terms of quality, or at least an acceptable starting point:
